attributes.action: Minimum 7 year sentence Guaranteed for being caught with a knife in public.
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime is through the roof with no sign of stopping. Holding a knife in public should be seen as intent to murder.
attributes.background: HELP ESTABLISH GUARANTEED LAWS WITH MINIMUM SENTENCING.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:

Increase the minimum sentence for the possession and use of a knife 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714854
